devdoc.details: All offline time records are stored encrypted on-chain, enabling computation without revealing plaintext

addOfflineRecord(bytes32,bytes).details: The encrypted value is added to the user's record array      ACL permissions are set to allow the contract and user to decrypt

params.inputProof: The zero-knowledge proof for the encrypted input

params.user: The address of the user whose records are being checked
params.viewer: The address of the viewer to check permission for

returns._0: True if the viewer has permission to view the user's records, false otherwise

compareEncryptedTotal(address,uint256,ui.details: Only the user or authorized viewers can decrypt the result

params.targetMinutes: The encrypted target minutes to compare against
params.targetProof: The zero-knowledge proof for the target

returns._0: An encrypted boolean indicating if the total meets or exceeds the target

getEncryptedAverage(address,uint256,uint.details: Only the user or authorized viewers can decrypt the result

returns._0: The encrypted average of offline minutes in the period

getEncryptedBestRecord(address).details: Only the user or authorized viewers can decrypt the result

returns._0: The encrypted maximum offline minutes across all records

getEncryptedMax(address,uint256,uint256).details: Only the user or authorized viewers can decrypt the result

returns._0: The encrypted maximum offline minutes in the period

getEncryptedStats(address,uint256,uint25.details: Only the user or authorized viewers can decrypt the results      This function combines getEncryptedTotal, getEncryptedAverage, getEncryptedMax, and getEncryptedBestRecord      into a single transaction to reduce gas costs and improve efficiency

returns.average: The encrypted average of offline minutes in the period
returns.bestRecord: The encrypted maximum offline minutes across all records
returns.max: The encrypted maximum offline minutes in the period
returns.total: The encrypted sum of offline minutes in the period

getEncryptedTotal(address,uint256,uint25.details: Only the user or authorized viewers can decrypt the result

returns._0: The encrypted sum of offline minutes in the period

params.user: The address of the user to query

returns.hasRecords: True if the user has at least one record, false otherwise
returns.recordCount: The number of records the user has

params.viewer: The address to grant access to
The address to revoke access from

accessControl.details: accessControl[user][viewer] = true means viewer can decrypt user's records

devdoc.title: SilentOur - Encrypted Daily Offline Time Tracking System

ZamaProtocolUnsupported().notice: Returned if the Zama protocol is not supported on the current chain

AccessGranted(address,address).notice: Event emitted when access is granted

AccessRevoked(address,address).notice: Event emitted when access is revoked

OfflineRecordAdded(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Event emitted when a new offline record is added

accessControl(address,address).notice: Mapping from user address to authorized viewer addresses

addOfflineRecord(bytes32,bytes).notice: Add a new offline time record for the caller

checkAccessPermission(address,address).notice: Check if a viewer has permission to view a user's records

compareEncryptedTotal(address,uint256,ui.notice: Check if encrypted offline time meets or exceeds a target (encrypted comparison)

dailyOfflineRecords(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from user address to their array of offline records

getEncryptedAverage(address,uint256,uint.notice: Get the average encrypted offline time for a user within a time period

getEncryptedBestRecord(address).notice: Get the best (maximum) encrypted offline time record for a user

getEncryptedMax(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Get the maximum encrypted offline time for a user within a time period

getEncryptedStats(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Get all encrypted statistics for a user in one transaction

getEncryptedTotal(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Get the total encrypted offline time for a user within a time period

getRecordCount(address).notice: Get the number of records for a user

getRecordTimestamp(address,uint256).notice: Get a specific record's timestamp (plaintext, for filtering)

grantAccess(address).notice: Grant access to a viewer address to decrypt the caller's records

revokeAccess(address).notice: Revoke access from a viewer address

userdoc.notice: A privacy-friendly DApp for tracking daily offline time using Fully Homomorphic Encryption
